text:
League 1
ASSE - Monaco: "We are two points behind the second"
In a half empty Geoffroy-Guichard, ASSE ended up winning 1-0 against AS Monaco thanks to a goal from Denis Bouanga. Discover the reaction of Zaydou Youssouf at the end of the meeting.
03 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Antoine Chirat



The Puel effect is there! At home, AS Saint-Etienne had difficulties against AS Monaco but ended up winning in a meeting marked by a very important intervention of the VAR on a possible red card Etienne side. But it is ultimately the Greens who win and relaunch themselves completely in the league. The residents of the Cauldron are now 8th, European places being within their reach.




"The championship is open"




Zaydou Youssouf in the green jersey + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

At the end of the match, Green midfielder Zaydou Youssouf came back on the new victory of his own: "It was complicated, both teams gave themselves 100% In the end it was hard, we were solid The coach changed the positions, it made us feel good, we scored the goal that was good, we needed to win at Geoffroy Guichard, there was an evolution. , there we are two points from the 2nd, it means that the championship is open, we must not let go, we must continue like this.
¬†Zaydou Youssouf: all information about the player
